# inputMeterLevel

**Instance Property**

The volume, in decibels (db), being received by the microphone.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputMeterLevel: Float { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is undefined if [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKVoiceChatService/isInputMeteringEnabled] is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Monitoring the Audio Level

- **isInputMeteringEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the microphone’s sound level is being monitored.
- **isOutputMeteringEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the voice level of remote participants is monitored.
- **outputMeterLevel**: The volume, in decibels (db), being received from all other participants.
